name: loq-plugin-marketplace
description: Official marketplace for loq Claude Code plugin

metadata.description: Marketplace hosting the loq plugin for Claude Code - SQL-based log analysis and query building for a cross-platform replacement of Microsoft Log Parser 2.2

plugins.name: loq
plugins.description: SQL-based log analysis and query building for loq - a cross-platform replacement for Microsoft Log Parser 2.2. Includes /loq command for quick queries and loq-specialist agent for complex migrations.
